description: React component implementing a device table that fetches device data from an API, displays it, and allows deletion of devices with confirmation.

methods.name: DeviceTable
methods.description: Functional React component that manages device list, fetches data from API, handles deletion, and renders a table.

methods.name: fetchDevices
methods.description: Asynchronous function to fetch device data from the API and update component state.

methods.name: handleDelete
methods.description: Asynchronous function to delete a device by ID with a confirmation prompt and update the device list.
